creator: bin_z@hotmail.com
text:
I am using FOP 0.17. I put <svg:text x="10pt" y="10pt">test</svg:text> in my fo 
file, when I run FOP I got warning message:
  WARNING: no Maker for text-anchor
  WARNING: property text-anchor ignored

The number of <svg:text> tag you use in your fo file you will get the same 
number of these two warning messages.

I tried to run examples which come with download, I got same results.

creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
text: This no longer occurs as all properties are handled correctly now.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
